title: Amazon finally brings USB-C to its most affordable Android tablet, the $60 Fire 7
content:
Amazon just revealed a new refresh of its super-affordable Android tablet, the Fire 7 (2022). And after years of using an outdated standard, Amazon is finally bringing USB-C to the Fire 7.

moreâ€¦

The post Amazon finally brings USB-C to its most affordable Android tablet, the $60 Fire 7 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The new Amazon Fire 7 2022 tablet is finally adding support for USB-C charging, as well as upgraded performance for just $60.
